MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionToSinkType As Integer

Docs.value: How the current device is connected to the display sink. For example, the display can be connected immediately to the device or there can be a receiver in between.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: The week of manufacture which ranges from 1 to 53, or -1 it is not available. Typically, it is not present if model year is available.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created andÂ shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: The year of manufacture, or -1 it is not available. Typically, one of model year or manufacture year is available.

Docs.value: Model year of the device. Return -1 if not available. Typically, one of model year or manufacture year is available.
